marytts.features

Class MaryGenericFeatureProcessors

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.features.MaryGenericFeatureProcessors
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MaryLanguageFeatureProcessors

    public class MaryGenericFeatureProcessors
extends Object
    A collection of feature processors that operate on Target objects.
    Author:
    schroed
